app_description: Craft professional CVs with ease. Our tools and templates help you stand out and land your dream job.
home_subtitle: Create professional CVs in minutes with our easy-to-use platform. Choose from modern templates and get hired faster.
template_description: Each template is carefully crafted to maximize your chances of success
create_cv_5_minutes: Create your professional CV in less than 5 minutes
data_encrypted_private: Your data is encrypted and private

amazing_tool: Amazing tool! I got my dream job within weeks of using this platform.

simple_fast_effective: Simple, fast and effective. Highly recommend for job seekers!

ourMissionDescription: At CV Atelier, our mission is to empower job seekers by providing intuitive and high-quality tools to create compelling CVs and resumes. We believe everyone deserves the chance to present their best self to potential employers, and our platform is designed to make this process easy and effective.
qualityDescription: We are committed to providing top-tier templates and features that meet the highest standards of design and functionality.
simplicityDescription: We believe in making complex tasks simple. Our user-friendly interface ensures a smooth and enjoyable CV creation experience.
innovationDescription: We continuously explore new technologies and design trends to keep our templates fresh and our features cutting-edge.
supportDescription: Our dedicated support team is always ready to help, ensuring you have a smooth experience from start to finish.
contactFormDescription: Have a question, feedback, or need support? Fill out the form below and we'll get back to you as soon as possible.
subject: Subject
messageSentSuccessfully: Message sent successfully! We'll get back to you shortly.
errorSendingMessage: Error sending message. Please try again.
faqSubtitle: Find answers to common questions about creating CVs, managing your account, and using our platform.
cantFindAnswer: Can't find the answer you're looking for?
reachOutSupport: Reach out to our support team, we're here to help!
termsSubtitle: These terms govern your use of our CV creation service.
privacySubtitle: Learn how we collect, use, and protect your personal information.

tips.summary_length: Aim for 80-120 words in your professional summary
tips.quantify_achievements: Include numbers and metrics in your achievements
tips.use_keywords: Use industry-specific keywords for better visibility
tips.action_verbs: Start bullet points with strong action verbs
tips.tailor_content: Tailor your CV content to the specific job role
tips.skills_relevance: Include 6-10 skills relevant to your target position
tips.proofread: Proofread carefully for spelling and grammar errors
tips.contact_updated: Ensure your contact information is up-to-date
tips.achievements_focus: Focus on achievements rather than job duties
